content: S-MD HWH and HHWH #3 Self-drilling hex screws (indoor) Self-drilling hex head screw (zinc-plated) for fastening sheet metal to steel substructures ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and robust drill point Galvanized zinc coating for indoor use Choice between Hex Washer Head (HWH) and High Hex Washer Head (HHWH) Applications Fastening profile steel sheets to light- and medium-gauge steel framing (maximum combined thickness up to 0.177 or 0.209 inch) Steel framing, truss or joist fabrication HVAC duct fabrication and installation Fastening accessories to studs (electrical boxes, clips etc.) Fastening accessories to studs (electrical boxes, clips, etc.) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Hexagon head Screw drive/recess type: 5/16 Hexagon Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Hexagon head | Screw drive/recess type | 5/16 Hexagon | Collated | No | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2098767 -
